text: Mana Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka gholonga, “Imulungu keka pfinu pfose hasi he maghulu ghake.” Lekeni ghamaandiko hagholonga, “Pfinu pfose pfikighwa hasi he maghulu ghake yapfitawale,” yakoneka ghendo Imulungu ng'alimumo bae mna pfinu apfo, kwaapfila yeye iyo iyekile pfinu apfo hasi he ghamaghulu gha Kiristu.
